messages.subject: Re: lord of the rings
messages.msgSnippet: www.lordoftherings.net has some very pretty production pictures, but one of the movie magazine websites will probably be able to tell you more about it...
messages.messageBody:
www.lordoftherings.net has some very pretty production pictures, but one of the movie magazine websites will probably be able to tell you more about it... www.empireonline.co.uk has some stuff, click on news and type lord of the rings in the search box (yes, really!!! :-) ) was looking for others, but Premiere doesn't have anything on it :-( anyhow, this should start you off <g>

Enjoy!
Tracy
----- Original Message -----
From: Brown
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, February 06, 2000 7:26 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] lord of the rings


From: Brown <mjcmbrwn@...>

Currently being filmed in New Zealand by??? - an American company. First
Hercules, then Xena, now Bilbo Baggins! Locations are kept secret, rumours are
rife. Personally, I'm not that keen that I am willing to scour the countryside
looking for the locations, but we are all looking forward to the movie.

Carol in New Zealand


> > >Will probably re-read Lord of the Rings before the first film comes out.
> > OK, that's me done (for now <g>)
> >
> > Tracy
> >
> > Movie!?!?!
> >
> > Nanci K.
>
> It was done about 20 yrs ago as a feature length cartoon.
> It was pretty good too as I remember.
>
> Buzz
